mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.room_num AS "roomNum", a.topic_name AS "topicName", a.hotel_id AS "hotel.id", a.floor_num AS "floorNum", a.layout AS "layout", a.roomtype_id AS "roomType.id", a.bed_type AS "bedType", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, room_num, topic_name, hotel_id, floor_num, layout, roomtype_id, bed_type, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{roomNum}, #{topicName}, #{hotel.id}, #{floorNum}, #{layout}, #{roomType.id}, #{bedType}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, room_num = #{roomNum}, topic_name = #{topicName}, hotel_id = #{hotel.id}, floor_num = #{floorNum}, layout = #{layout}, roomtype_id = #{roomType.id}, bed_type = #{bedType}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
